thread.title: Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks
thread.title_full: Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks

author: AP
title: Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks
text:
Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks Russell Westbrook scored 38 points and posted his 27th triple-double of the season to help the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the New York Knicks 116-105 Post to Facebook Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks Russell Westbrook scored 38 points and posted his 27th triple-double of the season to help the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the New York Knicks 116-105  //usat.ly/2lmgB3h   Westbrook scores 38 in triple-double as Thunder top Knicks AP 12:09   New York Knicks forward Kristaps Porzingis (6) blocks a shot by Oklahoma City Thunder's Steven Adams during the first quarter of an NBA basketball game in Oklahoma City, Wednesday, Feb. 15, 2017. (AP Photo/Sue Ogrocki) (Photo: The Associated Press) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) â€” Russell Westbrook scored 38 points and posted his 27th triple-double of the season to help the Oklahoma City Thunder beat the New York Knicks 116-105 on Wednesday night. 
Westbrook moved into sole possession of third place for the most triple-doubles in a season, behind Oscar Robertson's 41 in 1961-62 and Wilt Chamberlain's 31 in 1967-68. The star guard had 14 rebounds and 12 assists in the 64th triple-double of his career. 
Victor Oladipo scored 21 points and Jerami Grant added 13 for the Thunder, who snapped a two-game skid. 
Carmelo Anthony had 30 points for the Knicks after being selected to the All-Star Game as an injury replacement for Kevin Love earlier in the night. Derrick Rose scored 25 and Courtney Lee added 16.
